title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in salted boiling water.
Mix eggs and Parmesan cheese in a bowl.
Combine spaghetti, bacon, and egg mixture. Serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate the chicken with tikka masala spices.
Prepare a creamy tomato sauce with onions.
Add grilled chicken to the sauce and simmer. Serve with rice.
